text: "Sign of the Times" is the debut single by English singer Harry Styles from his self-titled debut studio album. It was released on 7 April 2017 by Columbia Records. It was written by Styles, Jeff Bhasker, Mitch Rowland, Ryan Nasci, Alex Salibian, and Tyler Johnson, and produced by Bhasker, Salibian, and Johnson. It is a pop rock and soft rock ballad. Its music video was released on 8 May. ==References== Category:2017 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Debut singles Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Harry Styles songs Category:Kygo songs Category:Ellie Goulding songs
title: Sign of the Times (Harry Styles song)
